subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: In one of the worst All-Star Games by a second baseman, Dan Uggla made a record three errors, going 0 for 4 with three strikeouts and grounding into a double play.
snippet: In one of the worst All-Star Games by a second baseman, Dan Uggla made a record three errors, going 0 for 4 with three strikeouts and grounding into a double play.
